name: Relaxing Chamomile
description:
Relaxing Chamomile is a hot processed soothing chamomile soap. Great to use after a long day. Scented with chamomile essentials oils. 


Ingredients: Goat milk, Coconut oil, Palm oil, Palm Kernel oil, Olive oils, Sunflower oil, Castor Bean oil, water Sodium hydroxide, chamomile, fragrances

name: Melaleuca
description:
Melaleuca is known as Tea Tree Oil. Its also know for its great antiseptic properties. This soap isn't made for scented reasons. It's more for antibacterial uses. 


Ingredients: Coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, glycerin, goats milk powder, purified water, sodium hydroxide,sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate, soy bean protein, shea butter, castor oil, sweet almond oil, Tea Tree Oil

name: Honey Bee Solid Lotion
description:
Honey Bee solid lotion is packed with moisture and skin softening properties. This isn't your average honey bee scent. Its scented with rich notes of blossoms and almonds. Your skin will be in for a Beeautiful Treat! 

Ingredients: Beeswax,Cocoa butter, Mango butter, Shea butter, Fragrances

name: Rose Mimosa
description:
Rose Mimosa is a very elegant floral soap with a romantic scent. The ingredients includes mango butter, which is moisturizing restores elasticity. Also helps with eczema and drying of the skin. It's also packed with beautiful scented rose buds. 

Ingredients: Coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, glycerin, goats milk,purified water, sodium hydroxide,sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate, soy bean protein, shea butter oil, castor oil, rose buds, fragrances

name: Lemon Bar
description:
Cheery yellow lemon scented salt scrub bar gently buffs the skin with shea butter,leaving your skin feeling soft and clean,but not dry. Also topped with fine grained sea salt.

Ingredients: Coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, glycerin,purified water, sodium hydroxide,sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate, soy bean protein, sea salt, shea butter,mango butter, sweet almond oil, lemon juice, yellow oxide, fragrances
